info.name: BlueBubble for RedBubble
info.description: Changes most of the theme colours on RedBubble.com from Red to Blue.
info.additionalInfo:
RELEASE NOTES:
v0.03
[August 10, 2015]
-Changed "ADD NEW WORK" on upload page to blue.
-Changed profile page icons to blue.
-Changed more links on profile page to blue.


v0.02
[August 7, 2015]
-Added icons & homepage logo to colour change list.
-changed menu colours.
-re-defined colour scheme (more uniform than before)


v0.01
[August 6, 2015]
-Changes most of the theme colours on RedBubble.com from Red to Blue.
